text: Cardiovascular Practical Class Joanna Aitken Aitken.j@unimelb.edu.au VETS30014/VETS90124 B Mode M Mode Doppler Three main modes of Cardiac Ultrasound Right parasternal long axis 4 chamber view Right parasternal short axis left atrium and aorta (MercedesBenz) Normal diastolic LA ratio : aorta = <1.5 Right parasternal short axis mitral valve (fish mouth) Right parasternal long axis 5 chamber view Right parasternal short axis Papillary muscles (mushroom) LA Standard right side cardiac views in B mode LA Overview of standard right sided views B mode
